description: Make progress over technical ice, mixed, and dry tooling routes with this leashless all-rounder. The ergonomic handle feels stable on delicate hooks and sketchy placements. On featured ice, it yields a natural feeling swing, and can be angled for pulling and torqueing. The curve offers generous clearance that still feels balanced. And, if you decide to leash, a small eyelet lets you thread a cord so you can keep your clip-in points free for other uses.Ergonomic handle with full strength upper and lower rests is glove friendly and feels super stable.T-rated shaft and pick.Full-strength clip-in point accessible from either rest.High clearance shaft gets around tricky bulges and mushrooms.Add the removable pick weights to punch into bullet-proof ice.Grip tape included.Supplied with DMM Ice Picks, compatible with Mixed picks.
name: DMM Switch Hammer Ice Tool
